nodes.text: The Emergency Response Team, also known as the ERT, was a response unit that operated on the planet Cularin during the Clone Wars. The team was made up fire fighters, medical personnel and rescue experts, and they used a large, black-colored limousine as their means of transport. Circa 21 BBY, the ERT responded to an explosion at a restaurant on Cularin and with the help of a group of freelance agents, they were able to bring the situation at the dining establishment under control.
